author: Arsene Lupin III
subject: FUNimation interview/suggestion box.
body:
If anyone has any specific questions or suggestions
for FUNimation regarding their release of Lupin III
movies, please send them to my Email address with the
subject "FUNimation." I'll compile them together and
whatever I can get answered, I'll return back to the
list.

And no, I'm not just Emailing them like I did with
Robert Woodhead or Carl Macek...this is the real deal,
folks.


=====
"Arsene Lupin III"
webmaster@lupinthethird.nospam.com
(Remove "nospam" to reply)
http://www.LupintheThird.com
